price: ហើយជាការពិតណាស់ យើងបានបង្កើតមនុស្សលោក (អាដាំ)ពីដីឥដ្ឋ(ផ្សំពីទឹកនិងដី)។
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min sulālatin min ṭīnin
